verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Raindrops rollin' off my brim
Streetlights got the pavement glistenin'
Touchdown, I fall into Your arms
Right where I belong
Your everlasting arms

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And where would I be
Without You...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'd be packin' my bags when I need to stay
I'd be chasin' every breeze that blows my way
I'd be building my kingdom just to watch it fade away
It's true
That's me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
That's me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
That's me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
Don't know where I'd be without You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Flashback, stepping through the scene
There's You and there's a very different me
Touchdown, You had me at belief
You had me at belief, You did

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And where would I be
Without You, without You...

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I'd be packin' my bags when I need to stay
I'd be chasin' every breeze that blows my way
I'd be building my kingdom just to watch it fade away
It's true
That's me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
Without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
That's me without
Without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
That's me without You-ou-ou-uo-ou-ou

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Don't know where I'd be without You
(Where would I be...)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
(I was so deep,
So incomplete
Til' You rescued me
Yeah, You rescued me)

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Packin' my bags when I need to stay
I'd be chasin' every breeze that blows my way
I'd be building my kingdom just to watch it fade away
It's so true
Me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
That's me without
That's me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
That's me without
That's me without You-ou-ou-ou-ou-ou
Don't know where I'd be without You
